name: NGEx Minerals Ltd.
longDescription: NGEx Minerals Ltd. is a Canada-based copper and gold exploration company with projects in Chile and Argentina. The Company is principally engaged in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in South America. The Company holds the large-scale Los Helados copper-gold deposit, as well as the Potro Cliffs and Valle Ancho Projects located in Argentina. The Company operates through three segments: Los Helados Project, Valle Ancho, and Corporate.

fullAddress: Suite 2000-885,West Georgia Street, Suite 2000, HSBC Building, VANCOUVER, BC, CA
